entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: L'Étape 8:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this evening then to freezing rain near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning and ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
